hero.title: Our history
hero.description: Relive the historic moments of SHL’s past and get to know some key events that shaped SHL in the past 30 years. And let’s not forget to look forward to a bright future.

events.title: Launch of the First Auto Injector
events.description: In 1996, SHL Medical launched its first auto injector, marking a significant breakthrough and positioning the company as a key player in the medical device industry.

events.title: Expansion with New Design Centres
events.description: In 2004, SHL Medical expanded significantly, opening design centres in Sweden and the U.S., and a 25,000 square meter manufacturing site in Taiwan.

events.title: Introduction of Advanced Manufacturing Techniques
events.description: In 2006, SHL Medical introduced advanced manufacturing techniques, enhancing production efficiency and product quality.

events.title: Launch of the Next-Generation Auto Injector
events.description: In 2008, SHL Medical launched its next-generation auto injector, featuring improved design and functionality.

events.title: Global Expansion and New Partnerships
events.description: In 2010, SHL Medical expanded its global presence and formed new partnerships with leading pharmaceutical companies.

events.title: SHL New website
events.description: In 2024, SHL Medical worked together with DEPT to create this new website.
